body_html:
You probably need to start queue runners: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/how_tos/threading_and_queues/index.html.

@ebrevdo It seems tedious, but should we mention queues everywhere we create one (or at least at the top of the bucketing doc)? It's pretty easy to not know one has to start queue runners after calling an obscure function.

body:
You probably need to start queue runners: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/how_tos/threading_and_queues/index.html.

@ebrevdo It seems tedious, but should we mention queues everywhere we create one (or at least at the top of the bucketing doc)?  It's pretty easy to not know one has to start queue runners after calling an obscure function.
